sentences.en: a story with believable characters in it
But I am very much believable, however, you'll get him to come.
sentences.cn: 我相信你不管怎样都能把他请来.

sentences.en: But the experts say only two of these stories are believable.
sentences.cn: 但是,专家们认为可信的只有两个.

sentences.en: Games and edutainment become captivating with the believable illusion of full - motion video.
sentences.cn: 由于全动态图像可信的假象,使游戏和教育娱乐开始变得具有吸引力.
他让个个角色都逼真可信。
她的解释听起来的确可信。

sentences.en: If you want to be loved, love and believable.
sentences.cn: 想被人爱,就要去爱别人, 并让自己可爱.——富兰克林.

sentences.en: It is full of quirky yet weirdly believable turns - and wacky , revealing dialogue.
sentences.cn: 这部影片充满了离奇但又可信的转折以及独特而又发人深省的对话.

sentences.en: It proved that this arithmetic has high precision and believable results.
sentences.cn: 经仿真结果验证,该算法预测精度较高,预测结果可信.

sentences.en: Personas should be typical and believable, but not stereotypical.
sentences.cn: 人物角色应该是典型和可信赖的, 但不是一成不变的.

sentences.en: That concept alone , as amazing as it is, would likely be believable.
sentences.cn: 这个令人吃惊的概念是可信的.
那样的设想完全是可信的。

sentences.en: The most believable guy to do that would be you.
sentences.cn: 最令人信服的人就是你.

sentences.en: The result shows: Its mark is believable, effectual.
sentences.cn: 结果表明: 其分数是可信的 、 有效的.

sentences.en: This book is full of believable, interesting characters.
sentences.cn: 这本书里充满了真实可信的有趣人物。

sentences.en: This excellent thriller is fast paced and believable.
sentences.cn: 这部优秀的惊悚片节奏快而且令人信服。

sentences.en: When repeated again and again , these affirmations became believable.
sentences.cn: 我们不断用这些话语为自己打气,效果也相当明显.

trans.tran_en: something that is believable can be believed because it seems possible, likely, or real
